name: Great North Shelter 2
description:
Great North Shelter is the strangest National Park you've ever seen.




As you embark on this spine-tingling journey, you'll play as a fearless female protagonist determined to uncover the truth behind the strange happenings. Piece together the intricate lives and biographies of the park's vanished inhabitants.

Key Features



  • Unconventional game mechanics designed to troll and surprise you, ensuring an experience filled with laughter and bewilderment. Be sure to leave no stone unturned and no angle unseen!
  • Strange Objects - A series of mysterious objects, which alter the environment and are integral to progressing through the game. Finding these will be key to moving forward in your journey so keep your eyes peeled.
  • A myriad of interactive objects that delight, surprise, and send shivers down your spine. We’ve put a lot of effort into these so be sure to check them all out!
  • Soul-stirring Compositions - A rare and beautiful musical score that only graces your ears at specific locations, further heightening the emotional and atmospheric impact of the game. Can you uncover all the game’s tunes?
  • Spellbinding Atmosphere - A dark, emotional, and narrative-driven adventure with a strong female protagonist at its core, masterfully weaving together elements of comedy and horror. Get immersed and entranced in this unforgettable journey.
  • Walking Story - A linear yet lore-rich journey that encourages you to dive deep into the world of Great North Shelter 2, exploring every nook and cranny to uncover its secrets. It’s an accessible experience regardless of the gamer stripes you carry.

Dare to uncover the truth in Great North Shelter 2 – where nature, mystery, and humor collide.
